name: Home Sweet Home (itch) (Hartoe)
description:
You wake up in a sleepy village with no memory of what had happened the night before. Even worse, you don't seem to have your phone or wallet on you! What happened last night? And how will you get home?

Home Sweet Home is a classic text-based adventure puzzle game played in the command prompt window. All interactions are done via text and ASCII art. The game is nice and short, so you can play through it within a few minutes. There are also two different endings for you to explore.

This game was made for the 8 Bits to Infinity Text Only Jam 2.
